alert.note: Alert for Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Rooks, Smith, northern Osborne and southern Phillips Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 715 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Smith Center to near Speed. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Smith Center around 720 PM CDT. Bellaire around 730 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Lebanon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
